TopicTitle: Are there any parts for regenerative cooling

Articles.Content: I play with Real Fuels and at some point in my career, I'm gonna want to start using Nukes for short interplanetary travel, but run into the snag of all my LH2 disappearing in a few days. Are there any mods that include cooling for these fuels?
I thought Real Fuels did?  Or at least it used to have a powered radiator of some sort.
yup, you should have radiators in there to use for cooling, however unless you use A LOT of them (thus increasing your vessel's mass considerably) you will still get boiloff on your cryo propellants
